subject: Management
title: Strengthening Relationships Through Conflict
description: A short lesson to help you apply Strengthening Relationships Through Conflict.

hook.text: After a heated but honest disagreement, two colleagues said their relationship felt stronger than before.

buildup.text: Conflict that gets resolved well builds deeper trust than no conflict at all.

discovery.text: John Gottman's research: the ability to repair after conflict predicts relationship success.

twist.text: It's not the fight that damages relationships. It's the failure to resolve it that does.

climax.text: Each resolved conflict proves: we can handle hard things together. That deepens the bond.

punchline.text: Resolved conflict is trust's strongest proof.

quiz.question: How can conflict actually strengthen relationships?
options: Successfully resolving conflict proves the relationship can handle hard things
Avoiding conflict keeps relationships permanently strong
Only small conflicts improve relationships while large ones always harm them
